That balance is precisely what I'm calling about. I paid that invoice three weeks ago.

What caused the delay, and why am I still receiving overdue notices?

Will this affect my credit or account standing in any way?

I also want to understand what safeguards you have against this happening again.

I appreciate your continued business despite this issue. I'm authorized to credit your account $45.00, which covers your monthly service fee, and this will appear as credit CR-2024-88419 on your next statement.

You're absolutely right, and I apologize for that oversight. I've updated your contact preferences to ensure you receive our quarterly update emails with all priority service numbers and your dedicated account manager's direct line, 800-555-7823 extension 3301.
